nodes.text: I have no problem as long as I as a gay man get to discriminate against libertians and and anyone calling themselves a christain. So if I own a business I get to fire someone because they are christian, jewish, conservative republican, muslim, or any anti gay person. I think you would have no problem with this solution.
No problem with it? You dream about itemoticon_xkill

People this country was born for people to live their live their own way, weather that means same sex , or different religion. If you dislike this and go against it your not a true Amercain. IF you say that same sex marriage is against the Bible your not a true Amercain. This country is built to go against having the church run everthing. So tough it, if men and women want to have same sex and marry each other, thats their choice and by Amercains we will honer their RIGHT!!! to do so! Thank YOU

Well let me tell you what Thomas Jefferson thinks of your pro gay sin folly: 'Whosoever shall be guilty of Rape, Polygamy, or Sodomy with man or woman shall be punished, if a man, by castration, if a woman, by cutting thro' the cartilage of her nose a hole of one half inch diameter at the least.' - Thomas Jefferson Amendment VIII: Thomas Jefferson, A Bill for Proportioning Crimes and Punishments Sodomy was outlawed in every state of the Union at one time. But now that homosexual sinners are coming out of their closets like the brazen hedonists that they are, we're regressing back to Sodom and Gomorrah values. Americans reject gay marriage. It's a perversion and an abomination.
